CHAT.comment: JOHN VAN DE KAMP, ET AL., Petitioners v. THOMAS LEE GOLDSTEIN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:06 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY T. COATES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF E. JOSHUA ROSENKRANZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY T. COATES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:01 p.m., the case was submitted.)
